trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 데이터를 제공는 <xref href="System.Timers.Timer.Elapsed"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the date/time when the <xref href="System.Timers.Timer.Elapsed"></xref> event was raised.
trans-unit.target: 날짜/시간을 가져옵니다 때는 <xref href="System.Timers.Timer.Elapsed"> </xref> 이벤트가 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Timers.Timer.Elapsed?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised on a <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool> thread, so the event-handling method might run on one thread at the same time that a call to the <xref:System.Timers.Timer.Stop%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method runs on another thread.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Timers.Timer.Elapsed?displayProperty=fullName>에서 이벤트가 발생 합니다는 <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool>스레드, 이벤트 처리 메서드는 동일한 하나의 스레드에서 실행 되므로 시간에 대 한 호출은 <xref:System.Timers.Timer.Stop%2A?displayProperty=fullName>다른 스레드에서 메서드를 실행 합니다.</xref:System.Timers.Timer.Stop%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool> </xref:System.Timers.Timer.Elapsed?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This might result in the <xref:System.Timers.Timer.Elapsed> event being raised after the <xref:System.Timers.Timer.Stop%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 이 될 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Timers.Timer.Elapsed>후 발생 하는 이벤트는 <xref:System.Timers.Timer.Stop%2A>메서드를 호출 합니다.</xref:System.Timers.Timer.Stop%2A> </xref:System.Timers.Timer.Elapsed>

trans-unit.source: This race condition cannot be prevented simply by comparing the SignalTime property with the time when the <xref:System.Timers.Timer.Stop%2A> method is called, because the event-handling method might already be executing when the <xref:System.Timers.Timer.Stop%2A> method is called, or might begin executing between the moment when the <xref:System.Timers.Timer.Stop%2A> method is called and the moment when the stop time is saved.
trans-unit.target: 시간을 사용 하 여 SignalTime 속성을 비교 하 여이 경합 상태를 방지할 수 없을 때는 <xref:System.Timers.Timer.Stop%2A>이벤트 처리 메서드 수 때 이미 실행 하기 때문에 메서드가 호출 되는 <xref:System.Timers.Timer.Stop%2A>메서드를 호출 하거나는 순간 사이의 실행을 시작할 수 때는 <xref:System.Timers.Timer.Stop%2A>메서드는 중지 시간 저장 될 때 순간과.</xref:System.Timers.Timer.Stop%2A> </xref:System.Timers.Timer.Stop%2A> </xref:System.Timers.Timer.Stop%2A>

trans-unit.source: If it is critical to prevent the thread that calls the <xref:System.Timers.Timer.Stop%2A> method from proceeding while the event-handling method is still executing, use a more robust synchronization mechanism such as the <xref:System.Threading.Monitor> class or the <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.CompareExchange%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 호출 하는 스레드를 방지 하기 위해 중요 한 경우는 <xref:System.Timers.Timer.Stop%2A>이벤트 처리 메서드 여전히 실행 되는 동안 진행 메서드와 같은 보다 강력한 동기화 메커니즘을 사용은 <xref:System.Threading.Monitor>클래스 또는 <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.CompareExchange%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.CompareExchange%2A> </xref:System.Threading.Monitor> </xref:System.Timers.Timer.Stop%2A>

trans-unit.source: Code that uses the <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.CompareExchange%2A> method can be found in the example for the <xref:System.Timers.Timer.Stop%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하는 코드는 <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.CompareExchange%2A>대 한 예제에서 메서드를 찾을 수는 <xref:System.Timers.Timer.Stop%2A?displayProperty=fullName>메서드.</xref:System.Timers.Timer.Stop%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.CompareExchange%2A>

trans-unit.source: The time the <xref href="System.Timers.Timer.Elapsed"></xref> event was raised.
